name: Cindy Davis
text: Customer courtesy, care with detail and reasonable.

name: Jana Lynn Beauty
text: I've been going there for years! Nice people and very good with cut and color. Ask for Arthur! He is my stylist..he is really good.

name: Charlotte Keith
text: I was looking for a place to dry cut and layer my hair and they did not disappoint. Hali was fast and friendly and did exactly what I asked for. Was very happy they were able to squeeze me in on my lunch break. Thanks I will be back.

name: Brandi Marino
text: Love Arthur! He is great with color!

name: Peggy Estrada
text: EXCELLENT, I have been using Donna, one o f the owners, over 20+ years.

name: Cheryl Walker
text: Nice place.  Service is good.

name: Michael Pierce
text: Great salon. Great massage therapist also.

name: Mary Doak
text: Always, courteous, considerate, from receptionist to hair stylist. A great place!

name: Harry Bishop
text: Been coming here for years.  Sam is the best.

name: Bob Kline
text: They Really know there stuff you walk out looking your self.very professional .

name: Shawn Ashcraft
text: Great people! Very professional

name: Lacey McCulloch
text: Asked for permanent color. Washed out after 2 shampoos. 😑

name: Karla Doire
text: Great massage

name: Will Rocca
text: Sara is great! And FAST! I'm impressed by how much she can accomplish each session. She is also very aware of client comfort as well as desired service and outcome.  Thank you, Sara!

name: Tiny King
text: I’ve been going here for almost a year and I love her!! 😀❤️ She’s very professional & sweet.

name: Annette Heerten
text: Great service. Sherrie does a wonderful job. Comfortable and professional.

name: Colby Lane
text: Great service for hair removal.

name: LK W
text: She's super nice and great at what she does! Went to 3 other people before her and I won't go anywhere else.

name: Kathy Abbott
text: Been going to Sara for a long long time.  She is great and also a great person.  Best in B'ham

name: LaRinda Green
text: Sherry is fantastic.

name: Mary Magnolia
text: A+++ service and highly skilled.

name: Angie Boatwright
text: Loved my experience here.😍 Ms. Lisa was the best! She noticed I was very nervous and did a great job easing my jitters. She talked to me through the whole process & it made the time go by so much quicker. I left with a little pep in my step.😊 Fast, friendly, & professional service 10/10 would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you Ms. Lisa.❤️

name: anna rose mabile
text: lauren is so professional and made me feel comfortable. 11/10 highly recommend! best sugaring i have ever had :)

resp.text: Thank you so much Anna for taking the time to leave such a great review!!

name: Sydney Smallwood
text: Amazing service. Lauren is the best. Been going to her for years.

name: Adrienne Barringer
text: Amazing experience and very friendly!

name: Natajah Amos
text: Used to go here all of the time but Lauren stopped being reliable. Whenever I tried to set appointments she would take over a week (or just stopped responding) to get back to me. For the years I went here, I thought it was crazy to just stop servicing me. But I plan on going to a new place and hopefully everything goes well. As for personality, Lauren was very sweet and made sure things went smoothly.

name: Jenn Anderson
text: Lauren was so personable, amazing, and accommodating! I had been looking for a new waxing place since we moved here a year ago and I'm so sad it took me this long to find this place! It was my first time sugar waxing and I loved it! For sure I will be a forever customer!

name: Jess Ask
text: Today was my first brizillian wax and I couldn’t have picked a better place. I booked Lauren and she could tell how nervous I was. She was so patient with me and encouraged me through the entire process. I was so insecure when we first started, but her kindness made me comfortable by the minute! I HIGHLY recommend this facility and I WILL be seeing Lauren in 4-6 weeks!

name: Tairian Nelson
text: Ellen is phenomenal! I started sugaring six (6) years ago only with Ellen. Never waxed before only sugared. I love it! Unfortunately, I moved to Michigan four (4) years ago and I only want to sugar. I found esthetician’s in Columbus OH, Birmingham MI, and Ann Arbor MI. No one is as amazing as Ellen. When I return home throughout the year to Montgomery AL, I book an appointment with Ellen. Ellen is the best ever!

name: Katie Jo Gossett
text: Very nice and well priced products

name: Crescent Licci
text:
IF YOU'RE LOOKING FOR A PLACE TO GET A WAX, LOOK NO FURTHER!!
I been going to Ellen for 2 years now, She is a wonderful person and does an amazing job. I would definitely recommend her.  She also has a number to text and a website if you want to make an appointment and responds quickly!

name: Shay
text: I was nervous at first, being that I am a Black woman and a plus size woman. However, when I walked in, Ms. Ellen made me feel so comfortable! She so kind and professional. Lauren is great, too! These are my go-to girls for all my sugaring needs. Lauren saved my life with a last minute service. They're great people and I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Cindy Howard
text: Jennifer Lambert is amazing! She was very helpful, professional, and did a fabulous job! I love the way my eyelashes look now, they went from barely there to luscious, I never want to be without extensions again. I would give her more than five stars if that was an option. LOVED HER!

name: Vernon Blake
text:
Love your new office!

Easy to find and access, plenty of free parking, nice waiting room, and very clean bathroom. Treatment room is clean, uncluttered, organized, private, and comfortable.

For anyone feeling a bit uncomfortable about any of the procedures or her facility, Ellen is very professional, has an excellent bedside manner, and will put your mind at ease.

Her expertise, experience, and passion for what she does is second-to-none!

resp.text: Thanks Vernon!! Everyone Loves my new location! Thanks you for your referral too!

name: Shelley Belly
text:
Thanks for the great Body Sugaring job you did, Ellen. I was a little nervous getting it ALL done but you really made me feel comfortable & I didn't feel nervous or embarrassed!  You are SO easy to talk to. Thanks for answering my million questions about hair removal. ;-).

PS:  your rooms are magnificent!  I felt like I was in a luxury spa (& I've been to a few!). I'll see you again soon. I have already recommended you to all my friends.

Thanks again - so much!

resp.text:
Hello Shelley!

Thank you for taking the time to visit my Google+ page and to leave this wonderful review.

I really enjoyed chatting with you - you were a lot of fun - and I appreciated all the questions you asked.

Intimate hair removal can be daunting for some, I know, so I'm glad that I put you at ease and that you felt comfortable, and are returning to continue with the process of hair removal.

I decorated my rooms myself, so thank you for the compliment!  I, like you, place hygiene and sanitation and cleanliness at the top of my list in my business.

I look forward to seeing you again soon.

Regards
Ellen

name: Lana Grier
text: I was c onfused regarding the various types of professional hair removal techniques. Ellen explained the differences between Electrolysis and Laser hair removal, as well as the advantages of Sugaring over traditional waxing. She was knowledgeable, friendly and patient, answering all of my questions so I could make an informed decision. Very much appreciated!

resp.text: Hi Lana, thank you for the kind review! I never get tired of discussing hair removal techniques. An educated client makes the best customer... it's a win-win! You're not alone regarding your confusion about electrolysis and laser hair removal treatments. I think most people are unaware they are two entirely different technologies, and one is MUCH better than the other... and yes... ELECTROLYSIS is the winner!!!

name: Taneshia Phomsavanh
text: Went here before and recieved amazing service.  Recently tried to book appt. And no one answered or called me back.  Maybe she went out of business.  Idk.

name: Taylor Reece
text: Thanks Ellen for the electrolysis you did on my neck and face. I highly recommend you to anyone. Love not having to shave my 5 o'clock shading constantly and no more razor burn.

resp.text:
Thank you, Taylor, for giving us the opportunity to assist you.  As you know, Electrolysis is the only FDA approved method of Permanent Hair Removal, and we thrilled that you're so pleased with the results.  Thank you, also, for taking the time to share your experience with others so that they too may benefit from professional hair removal.

Hide that razor!  :-)

name: Kimberly Holley
text: I can't rave enough about Lauren!  Super friendly...and super attentive!  I called last minute and she was able to work with my schedule -  although I am not a fan of the "pay by time"...because some people legs are longer than others...whenever I am in town I WILL ALWAYS run to Lauren!  BTW: Ellen is amazing too for electrolysis and sugaring for WOC! Dont say I didn't tell you...

name: Ginger Gams
text: This is the sugarwaxing Queen. I love Ellen. My husband calls her my Sugarmomma.

name: Lynn Daley
text: ""I thoroughly enjoy your hair removal articles about body sugaring and electrolysis. Also, I am now able to make an informed decision when choosing a permanent hair removal method. I look forward to visiting your new salon in Montgomery!"

resp.text:
Hi Lynn

I appreciate that you are visiting my Google+ page and reading my articles.  It's important to understand the types of hair removal methods offered and what they entail.

I look forward to hearing from you soon!

Ellen Dutton

name: Ellen D
text:
Thanks Vernon!!  Everyone Loves my new location!
Thanks you for your referral too!

resp.text: Hi Vernon, Thanks again for sending business our way... we're always happy to receive new clients and make new friends. I've been providing hair removal services in Montgomery for over 10 years now and it never gets old... :-)

name: Tricia Curry
text: Jessica is awesome. She made me feel so toally comfortable in what could have been a awkward situation.

name: Ayana Bell
text: No one answers the phone, I couldn’t even set up an appointment, went to their location and no one answered the door.

name: Destiny Caldwell
text: Great service.

name: Rebecca Brown
text: Called 4 times and left a message once. No one answered and no one called back. Gave them over a week to return my voice mail and nothing.

name: Sara Beasley
text: Lauren was awesome!!

name: Tanya C
text: I absolutely love Annette...I’ve been getting my eyelash extensions from her for over the last several months and wouldn’t go anywhere else...from the glue she uses (that doesn’t make my eyes watery) to the actual eyelash extension (which doesn’t weigh down my original eyelash) to the calming atmosphere, has me looking forward to a relaxing experience each time I visit her.  My eyes always look amazing and I love how it still looks so natural looking.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Tanya!! Your lashes are always so beautiful, even when you come in for your relash touch ups! I’m glad you enjoy them and that you take care of them so well. You are a real pleasure to work with and I always look forward to our visits.  😊🌺

name: Patricia Higgins
text: Annette is a consummate professional. I have used her electrolysis service numerous times now. It is a process. She makes appointments and operates totally on time, which I appreciate on my busy schedule. I would highly recommend her!

resp.text: Thank you Patricia...  and likewise, I appreciate your punctuality in return! It definitely makes life easier. 😊 You are a real pleasure to work with, I always enjoy our visits! 🌺

name: Sondra Personal
text: Annette is a professional, so my lashes look natural and perfect. Everything is very clean, organized and neat. I have very sensitive eyes and the products she uses did not irritate them at all. The lashes are lightweight, so I have to look in the mirror to tell if I have them on. She educated me on how to take care of them, from products not to use, to how to care for them.

resp.text: Thank you Sondra! Your lashes are so beautiful on you and really enhance your eyes. I’m glad you found me on Google.., you are a real pleasure to visit with! 🥰

name: Candous Langston
text: So thankful I found her!! She is caring and a true professional!! From those pesky invisible hairs that show up in sunlight to your bikini area, underarms, legs, and any random odd hair that's popped up just to drive you nuts, she does it all. Can't wait for the day I can break up with my razor and run off at a moment's notice in a tank top or to the pool... without the bumps! If you're thinking about it, you should definitely do it... but do yourself a favor and use Faith Electrolysis and Lashes! She does great work and has awesome prices so if it's important to you, no matter your budget, you can fit it in and do a little at a time. And results after a few sessions are permanent, unlike laser hair removal.

resp.text: Awww, I am very excited about your hairs that are almost gone already! 🥳 I am so glad that I’ve been a blessing to you!! Thank you so much!! 😊

name: Bernice Roden
text:
Annette is the sweetest lady. She really takes pride in her work and she’s very patient. Warm
and relaxing environment. Enjoy every visit and
I’ve seen great results. I’ll recommend her to anyone. Thanks Annette for caring!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Bernice. 🤗 Your hairs have had amazing results in the quantity as well as in the texture. I love seeing the progress and rapid reduction! You’re looking great! Thanks for being such a blessing to me!! 🥰

name: Stacey Walker
text:
The 3 "P's of a worthwhile transaction is .....Person -Process- Product

Person: Annette is beautiful inside and out.  She takes pride in her skills and the execution of her services.  Her establishment is very clean and calming. Her "Faith" is present everywhere and pours out of her.

Process: You are well informed prior to service which makes you comfortable making the investment in yourself

Product:  She uses quality product

I love my lashes! If the eyes are the window to the soul...then.... 'My beautiful eyes my beautiful soul!"

resp.text: Thank you so much for choosing me to be a blessing to you. I believe the Lord was in this!! And I’m so glad you love your lashes! They are definitely a window to your beautiful soul!!

name: Sakayla Davis
text:
Ms. Annette is the best of the best!

She's very good at this electrolysis

She take much joy into her work and it
absolutely shows !

It's an process and having patience is key for me because I have very stubborn and course hair.

I have faith that this technique of hair removal will be the best idea a friend could recommend!

During my treatment sessios I can see a difference in the area she work her wonders.
I love going to Faith Electrolysis because I can see a difference. Ms. Annette has been very faithful by working with me. I appreciate her very much! She is the 2nd electrolysis have I have attempted and will definitely be the last!

resp.text: Thank you Kayla! When you first called me you were seeing someone else and I almost said no to you, as we don’t trade clients back-and-forth. But I am so glad I said yes, as I have seen an amazing difference in your hairs and in your skin since you’ve been coming to me! Thank you for giving me the chance and the opportunity to make a difference in your life. You look great!!!  🤗🌺

name: Lana Williams
text: Annette is very kind, beautiful,  and encouraging  professional that has been a true blessing. She does her best to accommodate you in any way  she can. She always strives to ensure you understand the process and work to remove the hair.   Although a bit skeptical at first, this has been one of the best decisions of my life. It takes a little time but has worked very well for me and has been a great success. I am not as self-conscious as I once was and feel much better about my neck and face area.  I appreciate all that Annette has done for me and has truly become a great friend!  I would recommend this place to anyone looking for great results!  She is fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you so much Lana...  I am so glad you didn’t give up! Some of your hairs were very stubborn, but with determination and perseverance, we made it through. You are beautiful on the inside and the out, and I’m glad you drove out of your way to come to me for your hair removal needs. You have become a very dear friend, and I will always be here for you! 🤗

name: Amy Reno
text: If you want your facial hair gone at a fair price, then look no further. Excellent quality work.

resp.text: Thanks Amy!!  I love you and your mom coming to me! You two have both been been a blessing!! 🤗

name: Donna Crossley
text: I just love Annette at faith Electroysis. I am a fellow electrologist and I won't go anywhere else and just trust anyone. We have become great friends and I don't know where I would be without Annette. We share all our problems and successes and get together regularly to share the latest and greatest in the field. Her shop is cozy and homey and yet high tech with the latest computerized machine. She is patient and kind and does wonders for my spiritual state of mind every time I see her.I highly recommend Faith Electrolysis and I just love all the work she has done for me personally.

resp.text: Thank you so much Donna...  you have been such a blessing to me in so many ways!!  Like you, I don’t trust just anyone working on my body, but I do have complete trust in letting you work on me! I am grateful for all the hours we’ve spent driving back and forth to work on each other! I value our friendship and I am so glad to have you to bounce ideas off of and to share in all of our “Electrolysis talk” with!!  😊 Lol.  Love you Girl! I appreciate you so much!!

name: Katie Cassidy
text: Annette is the sweetest and does great work!! She is so flexible to accommodate working with you around whatever hours you need. 😊

resp.text: Thank you Katie, you have been a real pleasure to work with! It’s so exciting watching your hairs thin out and dwindle to nothing! A little bit more and they’ll be gone forever! 😁

name: Stacey Lydecker
text:
Faith Electrolysis is very clean, private and very accommodating. Very professional, personable and I highly recommend.
Annette has been such a blessing!

resp.text: Thank you Stacey...  it has been a real pleasure to work with you and to watch your hairs thin down and disappear all together! In the midst of it all we’ve developed a sweet friendship that I will cherish always! 😊

name: Kelly Brimer
text: Annette was amazing! I absolutely love my lashes!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kelly!! They look absolutely beautiful on you!! You are a real pleasure to work on. 😊

name: Carissa Rickman
text: This place is so amazing! I am thankful that I got connected and have had lasting results.  I have nothing but wonderful things to say about Faith Electrolysis!

resp.text: Thank you Carissa...  It has been a real blessing to work on you. You have been such an inspiration to me, and I cherish the friendship that has developed in the midst of eliminating hairs! 🤗

name: Amy Albers
text: Annette is fabulous, truly a blessing! I reccomend her to any lady who is self conscious about unwanted hair, spider veins, etc.  Plus, she does beautiful lashes! Best prices in town, clean, private, and personable.

resp.text: Thank you. It has been a real pleasure working on you and with you!  You are such a sweetheart, and I’m glad to be a blessing to you! 🌺🤗

name: Deb Nethery
text: Unwanted hair can be overwhelming to manage on a daily basis whether shaving or tweezing. Self conscious and embarrassed for years by unwanted facial hair (in particular), I am so appreciative of the complete understanding, support, and positive electrolysis results that I have received with Faith Electrolysis. It is amazing how one's self esteem can increase with the very first​ treatment!

resp.text: Yes, and thank you. I completely agree...  what we see each day and how we feel about it can really affect our self esteem. You are beautiful inside and out!!  I am so glad to be a blessing to you. 🙏😊

name: mo anderson
text: Excellent service🤗🤗🤗.

resp.text: Thanks Mahogany! Every time you come, you are a real joy!! Thanks! 😊

name: Alicia Whitaker
text: Electrololysis has been a miracle and life changing event for me.  I went from having to shave my chin and sides of my face and neck every day to not having to ever shave them areas again.  I had so much facial hair it was so embarrasing and so noticeable but with the electrolysis that ive been doing it has almost got rid of all the hairs and i have only been doing this for a short period of time and the hairs are almost completely gone its amazing the results and i am so happy i will never have to shave my face again and the hairs are almost gone forever.  Finally something out there that really works. Ive tried everything from shaving to plucking from waxing to lazer to creams and nothing ever worked till now.  I am so glad i tried electrolysis cause it has changed my life forever and i feel like a new person now and im not having to shave anymore and that is such a blessing.  I highly recommend faith electrolysis it has really made a difference and Annette is a very kind christian honest hardworking woman who does an excellant job and i think anyone who is considering electrolysis should definately come here cause they will be extremely happy with the results just like i am.

resp.text: Thank you! 🙏 It has been such a blessing to watch as your hairs have disappeared!! When you first came to me, your hairs were as thick and coarse as a man’s beard, and now after only a few months, they’re almost gone! Thank you for sharing your testimony, and for not giving up!  You are beautiful!! 😊

name: Kendria Jones
text: Mrs. Donna is the best! After a few weeks of treatments I already saw a change in my chin and neck area. After SIX treatments she completely cleared my problem area! I was in tears of joy after my last treatment and I will be coming back for regular maintenance. Mrs. Donna also gives excellent tips for how to maintain your skin before, during, and after electrolysis. My experience was/is amazing. I would give 10 stars if I could. I have a new found confidence!

name: Diana Dorantes
text: I waited to review her until after I had gotten a couple of sessions. She does an amazing job! Its not as painful as I thought it would be and she is so professional, informed, and skilled with all she does. She never makes you feel embarrassed or uncomfortable. If you are not sure schedule a consultation with her first and see how wonderful she is!

name: Kristin Howell
text: Good experience.  Donna is so warm and friendly.

name: Pamela Hatcher
text:
I would like to speak to all the African American women who think that electrolysis is bad for your skin and believe  that Electrolysis  does not work on our skin. I have had chin hairs for over 30 years, that's until I met Donna. Her procedure along with her knowledge has done wonders for my chin hair. I am almost hair free. I had the worst hair bumps along with the dark spots, It was awful. Now my chin is smooth, my dark spots are becoming lighter, I am more than pleased with Donna and her work. I urge any African American woman to pay Donna a visit  for their hair removal. I urge you to stick with it, you will be happy that you did. I am. We now have a way to get rid of unsightly hairs on our face. My only regret is that I did not do a before and after pictures.

Donna thank you so much, I love you lady :).

resp.text: Thank you so much Pamela! I am so glad you have stuck it out with me. It has been a wonderful journey and I have enjoyed watching your beautiful face transform back to what it should be. My favorite part is seeing you leave so tickled and happy that the hair is finally gone. You are a beautiful lady inside and out and I really look forward to seeing you come in. I love you too beautiful lady!

name: Tammie Stroud
text: Very impressed with her professionalism and knowledge. I am very pleased with my results!!! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you Tammie for your review. I just love what I do and I enjoy working with you.

name: Debbie O
text: I have been going to Skin Deep Electrolysis for 2 months.  I have had 4 visits.  After 28 years of doing Electrolysis for my facial hair starting in 1991 in Jasper, AL, then in Birmingham, AL after I moved there and finally when I moved here to Madison, AL, going every two-three weeks, I finally have HOPE that it is finally going to end.  Donna Crossley uses a procedure that I not had before and it is phenomenal.  If you have had electrolysis before or have never tried it but need something to help with unwanted hair, I highly recommend Skin Deep Electrolysis.  You will be so happy, and hopeful, if you do.  Donna will explain the entire process thoroughly with you.  Explaining the difference from other forms of electrolysis with what she uses. I have even found the blend method to be less painful than what I have been having.  This past summer I had to look for another Electrolysis.  I did not know Skin Deep Electrolysis was here in Madison.  In October it had been four months since my last electrolysis session and at that point I was getting so very desperate.  The growth of hair was causing extreme stress that I thought I was going to have to resort to shaving.  Then I was told of Skin Deep Electrolysis.  There has been such a turn around for me and my facial hair problem.  I will forever be grateful I was guided here. Thank you Donna for what you have done for me and just understanding.  A new friend that I will always be grateful for.   I now can see truly for the first time since 1991 that the day I can stop going for electrolysis is actually going to happen.  My skin is looking better.  Try it you will love it.

resp.text: Thank you Debbie for being open minded and trying something new. I am so very happy to renew your faith in electrolysis. I use blend electrolysis because it works so well. I am happy to help you finally end this long journey and I truly enjoy our time together. Thank you for such a beautiful testimony.

name: Dwayne Hubbard
text: I highly recommend Skin Deep Electrolysis service. Donna is very gentle and patient with my teenage girls. She explains them the whole process, and answers all questions. We are very happy with result.

resp.text: Thank you Dwayne. I love helping people but I especially love helping our youth. They have so many pressures to deal with in school and their self esteem is vulnerable.

name: Cami Bridges
text: I am currently undergoing electrolysis treatments with the AWESOME Donna Crossley.. She always goes above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and confident. I am so thankful to have found her!! She is extremely knowledgeable about the electrolysis process and always takes the time to explain what she is doing and gives me great skin care advice. I would recommend her to anyone needing a little "Skin TLC". I always feel like I'm going to visit a friend, not just another "appointment".. Thank you Mrs. Donna, you're the BEST!! ❤

resp.text: Thank you. I love to spoil my clients and I love to teach.

name: Brittany Burden-Knox
text: She’s very knowledgeable in what she does and I actually have learned a lot from her in every appointment that I have had so far. My session wasn’t very painful either, but that may be due to my pain tolerance. I would 100% recommend her!

resp.text: Thank you Brittany. I think skin care is first and foremost. The hair removal should never compromise the skin.  You are a beautiful lady. Thank you!

name: Faith Electrolysis & Lashes
text: Donna has been such a blessing to me! I am also a fellow Electrologyst, and I am very picky on who I let work on my body! I trust Donna completely!!! We drive back-and-forth many hours to work on each other, and she has always been a blessing to me! Donna goes far beyond any Electrologyst I’ve ever met in being clean and sanitary! She uses only the best equipment to make sure everything is clean and safe. She is also an RN, so her medical knowledge in how the body works, along with her desire to understand all the equipment, every probe, every wire, and how everything functions with your hair growth system is absolutely Amazing!!! She teaches me more and more each day as a coworker, as a client, and as a friend. I highly recommend Donna at Skin Deep Electrolosys to everyone in the Huntsville area!!! You won’t find anyone who cares about your skin and hair removal needs like she does. Thank you Donna for everything!! 💕🤗🙏

resp.text: Thank you so much Annette. I just love the time we get to spend working on each other and trying new settings and equipment. It's is nice to have a professional sounding board and a friend I can trust. We are a small niche in today's world and we have to take care of each other. I love you girl!

name: Samantha Hathorn
text: My first electrolysis session ever. Extremely informative, very nice. She did everything to make me feel comfortable. And now my old witchy hair is gone!  Will certainly recommend a skin deep electrolysis.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. I enjoyed our visit.

name: Martina N
text:
The BEST!!! ❤️ I have absolutely nothing negative to say about this business or Donna!! The business is clean, pretty, and comforting. The chair that I sit in as she's working her magic is super comfortable, her equipment is top quality, and I love the music she plays.. so relaxing. Donna is super sweet and extremely knowledgeable about everything electrolysis and skin care!

(fyi.. I used to go to a DIFFERENT electrologist in Franklin, TN who basically robbed me of my time and money. That other lady was super rude, and almost made me lose hope.. She wasn't very knowledgeable about what she was doing. Her technique did nothing for me; the hairs would grow back in a few days... So be careful, not all electrologists are legit!! Or at least she wasn't for me)

Donna, however, has given me hope back that I can get this hirsutism finally under control. The technique that Donna uses works! It kills the hairs, and it takes quite some time for new hairs from the new cycles to appear. And when they do, I can tell that there is already less. She is lgbt+ friendly, and also knows quite alot about PCOS, so don't be afraid to reach out to her business if you're looking to kill some hairss!!

I'm so extremely grateful that I found Skin Deep Electrolysis!

resp.text: Thank you Martina. I just love it when you come into the shop. You are such a wonderful person. I am so sorry you had a bad experience with electrolysis in the past. I truly feel that electrolysis is an art and a science all rolled up in one. I just love what I do and I am happy to see you getting the results that are long overdue.

name: Mallory Martin
text: Donna is working on my facial hair, and she is the best! I love how intelligent she is about electrolysis! I am so pleased with her work! Thank you for giving me my confidence back!

resp.text: Thank you Mallory. Your gorgeous and I love working on you!

name: Klenia Hernandez
text: I am currently undergoing electrolysis treatments with Donna Crossley and I am extremely satisfied with the results. Donna did an excellent job explaining the entire process and making me feel at ease with my decision to try electrolysis for the first time. I am very pleased with her services. I highly recommend her for anyone looking for a permanent solution to unwanted hair.

name: Denise Hood
text: Donna uses a blend method and it produces amazing results. I highly recommend her.

resp.text: Thank you Denise. I can do Thermolysis but blend is definitely my favorite modality for fast amazing results.

name: Gary McCormick
text: Excellent results, guys get that ear hair gone for good.

resp.text: Thanks Gary! I just love working on ears. I'm pleased with your results.

name: Mel
text:
Donna is absolutely amazing at what she does. She is not only very educated but extremely thorough as well. She takes her time to explain each step of the process and ensures that you are aware of the expectations involved with your specific treatment. She is patient and answers any and all questions and even provides advise on home solutions without trying to sell products.
She is without a doubt a rare and valuable find and offers something that laser treatment can’t and that is a permanent solution for unwanted hair. Today was my second treatment and she was just as meticulous if not more than the first visit. I made sure to schedule my third before leaving and will continue this process until I have completely eliminated my problem area. I highly recommend Donna as she will not disappoint you in the slightest bit whatsoever.

name: Debbie Roderick
text: Excellent results!

name: Debbie Roderick
text: Excellent results!

name: Gary McCormick
text: Excellent results, guys get that ear hair gone for good.

resp.text: Thanks Gary! I just love working on ears. I'm pleased with your results.

name: E G
text: Excellent quality and service!  Donna is extremely knowledgeable and professional.  Right decision to go to Skin Deep.

name: Jamie Leigh
text: Donna is amazing, and cares about her clients. She is honest with what your expectations should be, and does a great job at making you feel comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you Jamie. You are amazing and I love taking care of your beautiful skin.

name: Kimmi Behm
text: I love never having to shave my underarms any more. :) Best convenience investment I've made for myself in a long time.

name: Carol Price
text: Donna is awesome!!! The best electrolysis experience ever!

resp.text: Thank you! I have awesome clients too!

name: Harrison Zabell
text: Very professional, exceedingly trustworthy, thank you!

name: janet williams
text: Shirley is professional and she has a sweet disposition that makes going to take care of unwanted hair a pleasant experience. I have used her services for a while and she has never made me feel awkward or embarrassed during my sessions. And I can also say that this is the only way to rid yourself of unwanted hair, don't be fooled into the laser treatments, for me those were a total waste of time and money!

name: Milla Walker
text: Shirley is the best Electroylsis that I have ever used. She is extremely professional and knowledgeable about her profession. I would highly recommend her to anyone.

name: Sue Terrell
text: Really personable and made me feel like family!  Highly recommend!

name: Hugh harstin
text: Shirley made me feel comfortable during my treatment.

text: Awesome
